lead.p: setTimeout — Executes a code snippet or a callable repeatedly, with a fixed time delay between each call.

parameters.parameter: Number of milliseconds to wait between execution.
All following parameters will be passed to the callable.

return.p: Returns the id of the current interval.
This id can later be used with: clearInterval.

notes.p: setInterval can run into trouble if delay is too short. See setInterval for a workaround in these cases.
